content: surprise your little fashionista with this cool knit pullover that she ll love to wear stitched in red heart roll with it tweed this garment features a fun marled effect that really brings it to life starting at the neck you ll do basic raglan increases in the round then you ll divide your work for the body and sleeves because it s knit top-down and in one piece there is very minimal finishing pattern is offered in 2 4 6 and 8 year old sizes sizes to fit chest measurement 2 yrs 21 53 5 cm 4 yrs 23 58 5 cm 6 yrs 25 63 5 cm 8 yrs 26 66 cm finished chest measurement 2 yrs 24 61 cm 4 yrs 26 66 cm 6 yrs 28 71 cm 8 yrs 30 76 cm
